RE Students’ Interview Session with Industry Professionals 2024
===============================================================

by [norainismail](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/author/norainismail/ "Posts by norainismail")
 | Feb 27, 2024 | [News](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/category/news/)
, [Uncategorized](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/category/uncategorized/)

![](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/2-1080x675.png)

**JOHOR BAHRU, Jan.** **11** – The student society club Persatuan Pengurusan & Penilaian Harta Tanah (PEHARTA) and Land Administration & Development Society (LADS) under the Department of Real Estate from the Faculty of Built Environment and Surveying (FABU) at Universiti Teknologi Malaysia (UTM), together with industry partner Mr. Ewe Lee Chng from Comet Catcher Sdn. Bhd. organized an annual program entitled Real Estate Students’ Interview Session with Industry Professionals 2024. The programme was held on 11 January 2024 in the FABU Convention Hall and was attended by 18 companies with real estate backgrounds, including Malaysian and Singaporean companies  [https://news.utm.my/2024/01/re-students-interview-session-with-industry-professionals-2024/](https://news.utm.my/2024/01/re-students-interview-session-with-industry-professionals-2024/)
